Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1983...
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/2/1983 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/29/1986 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/26/1986 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from Texas to Cincinnati on 1/31/1991 (Going to CIN: SS C. Reynolds, P G. Cadaret. Going to TEX: SS G. Hoffman)...
Injured on 5/15/1991 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/8/1991...
Injured on 9/9/1991 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 5/3/1993 with a Bruised Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/18/1995 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
